website_summaries.verdict: A magnet on this unique little bottle opener helps to both hold the cap and keep the opener handy on the fridge.
pros: Can be used with one hand
Keeps you from struggling with your beer
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: The function on this opener is a little different than others and may take a few tries to master

customer_reviews.title: Best Opener Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this opener because I wanted to not crease my bottle caps. This opened is awesome to use. It does not damage the bottle caps and the little magnet holds the caps in place after opening. Truly a very cool opener.
customer_reviews.author: KarpeTech

customer_reviews.title: especially great when trying to open a beer with a baby ...
customer_reviews.text: especially great when trying to open a beer with a baby in one hand ...not that i have any personal experience with this...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this bottle opener!!! When I bartend I open at least a hundred bottles a night. It still works as good as the day I got it. Not to mention it's a Great conversation piece with the customers.
customer_reviews.author: Woodhunter

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s honestly easier to use my caribiner that holds my keys to open beers . This thing is not at all conveniently sized either. It’s huge.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The finish could be a little smoother, but it's fine. The magnet is great for keeping hold of the cap, but also allows you to stick it to the frig.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer42

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great gadget to impress my beer drinking friends. I've become known for having "interesting" bottle openers and this does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, great execution
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Takes just a little pressure to pop the cap right off. Great for home brewers, as the cap doesn't get bent; making it reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Grinsell

customer_reviews.title: Just when popping open a beer was becoming too difficult...
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is the greatest beer bottle opener ever. Hate struggling to crack open your beer, well now you don't have to! In one quick squeeze, it's all over with and you're enjoying your beer. And it's a magnet, so it will never get lost in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: 4eva

customer_reviews.title: Simple design but effective and durable
customer_reviews.text: The directions make it super easy and it's proven to be a hit as a gift for my uncle.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Unusual but very useful...bought several to go with other gifts...pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Eldridge Gene Burns

product_meta.title: GrabOpener One Handed Grab Opener for Bottles, Blue
feature_bullets: Strong neodymium magnet lines up opener, retains cap, secures opener to fridge
Made in the USA - Utah, Colorado, Montana

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars90 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
